overview: In the not-too-distant future, a ruthless confederation of planets has managed to take control of the entire universe. Only one person has the strength and faith to oppose them. The sequence of events that will bring the end of the known universe will begin with a patrol control...

production_companies.name: O Tarz Mı Görsel Sanatlar Enstitüsü

tagline: One Man Against Faith, Galaxy and Gentleman
title: Mon: The Man Who Wear Orange
